main.name: Mahmud Abdur Rahman
main.description: Peace be upon you. I'm a Python & PHP enthusiast from Bangladesh. I've been with the web development industry for over 4 years & successfully deployed numerous projects
main.bio: Professional Python, PHP & Javascript developer specialized in Django framework from Python, Laravel framework from PHP & React. I've started my career with PHP since 2014 and mastered CodeIgniter, CakePHP, Laravel, Lumen etc. over the years & based on the projects I was working on. Developed my own MVC framework & CMS with PHP, you may find them on my Github account & use them for your own development. For some research works I started up with Python around 2017/18 & since then I'm in love with Python & it's libraries. Also started with React JS for frontend development for REST & GraphQL API integration. I love music, playing guitar & ukulele and travelling.
main.contactmessage: If you think I can be of any help for you, please don't hesitate to contact me.

testimonials.text:
He released the two seas, meeting [side by site]
Between them is a barrier [so] neither of them transgresses
Do they not see the birds controlled in the atmosphere of the sky? none holds them up except Allah. Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe.
So be patient. Indeed, the promise of ALLAH is truth
